settings.about_banner_heading: Our 5 Star Reviews speak for themselves

settings.review_paragraph: Garrell stands out from other designers in that ALL of their plans are aesthetically pleasing to the eye.  They have great floor plans that you can use as-is or tweak to your needs.  No wasted space or undefined uses for rooms.
